repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits.

summary.p:
2 folded folios of tables of Indian syllabaries (1 column per script) bound in one volume:
Table 1: nagri ancien, thibétn lañjâ, d° umi, d° khyugayé, d° , d° , kawi, grantha, malayâla, tamil, telugu, , , cinghalais.
Table 2: népal. rañja., népal propre, d° bhanjinmâlâ.
Some columns are left blank and were to receive further syllabaries (see annotation in black ink).
Description based on the examination of the original manuscript (November 2019).
Dimensions assessed at the time of examination.

collation.desc: 1 folio = Table 1. Arabic pagination 1-2 in black pencil. Arabic pagination 139-140 in black ink, crossed-out. 470 x 610 mm.
1 folio = Table 2. Arabic pagination 3 in black pencil. 470 x 180 mm.

handNote.script: devanagari grantha latin malayalam sinhalese telugu tamil
handNote.desc: As well as other scripts (Tibetan, Kawi). Black pencil annotations. Hand of Édouard Ariel?
Nepalese scripts. Hand of Édouard Ariel?

additions.desc: Title printed on the spine: ARIEL. ALPHABETS
BnF shelfmark sticker: FR. NOUV. ACQ 8884 (spine).
BnF shelfmark sticker: FR. NOUV. ACQ 8884 (front cover, verso).

binding.p: Hard paper covers, marbled on the outer faces.

provenance.p: Autograph work by Édouard Ariel (1818-1854)? Bequeathed by Édouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177).

acquisition.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. — See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 7 = Dons: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895, no. 1192.

listBibl.bibl: Rosny, Léon de. 1868. La bibliothèque tamoule de M. Ariel, de Pondichéry. In: Variétés orientales (pp. 177‒224). Paris: Maisonneuve.
